links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (18,-95,126).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - 2 x) (1 - 7 x) (1 - 9 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 26 2013 *)
prog: (Sage) [((9^n - 2^n)/7-(7^n - 2^n)/5)/2 for n in xrange(2,20)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009(MAGMA) I:=[1,18,229]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 18*Self(n-1)-95*Self(n-2)+126*Self(n-3): n in [1..20]]; /* or */ m:=20; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-2*x)*(1-7*x)*(1-9*x)))); // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 26 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
